# Careers at Apify

Help us make the web more programmable.

View open positions

## Why choose Apify?

We build software tools and cloud infrastructure that helps individuals, startups, and the worlds largest companies leverage the full potential of the webthe largest source of information ever created in the history of humankind. Join Apify to help them succeed and shape the future of the web.

## How we work 

At heart, were hackers who always find a way forward, even if it doesn't look like there is one. We work with talented colleagues in a friendly, inspiring, and no-bullshit environment. We respect people's time and dont like wasting it. We ask for forgiveness, not permission. We are fun. We're building the company that we always wanted to work for.

[Learn more](https://apify.notion.site/How-we-work-aka-Apify-culture-8935f71f12284aaaac58b5acedb0e1fd)

## Our values

Although we no longer fit into one room, we act as if we were in one.

Open

Just like our platform, were open towards each other, our community, new ideas, and feedback.

Driven

We focus on goals with the highest impact and get them done. Each of us can initiate and lead change.

Responsible

We respect our decisions, deliver on commitments, own our mistakes, and learn from them.

Flexible

We will always find a way while staying true to our core principles.

Team

We encourage mutual trust and support while remaining humble.

[More photos and videos](https://apify.notion.site/Memories-from-Apify-team-buildings-other-events-fb77740ab4eb4ff7bdf63edd0b0306c7)

## Benefits

Attractive compensation

We strive to pay above market, have a profit-sharing scheme, performance bonuses, and offer stock options to share the companys future success.

Flexible working hours and vacation

We look at the output of work, not the input. Nobody tracks how long you work, when, and from where. We dont count paid days offpeople usually take 25 days per year.

Cool office in the heart of Prague

Apifys headquarters are in a newly renovated loft in the iconic Lucerna Palace in Prague. The Brno office is in a modern co-working space in the Titanium business center.

Unforgettable events

87% of Apifiers say our company team-buildings, offsites, and parties are legendary  In our office, we regularly host engaging public meetups, talks, and conferences.

Food for the body and mind

We offer free lunches for people in the office, regular team breakfasts, and Eat&Learn sessions. Our office has an unlimited supply of fruits, snacks, good coffee, and beer.

Many perks

Our generous hardware and education budget will keep you at the top of your game. We offer Multisport cards, yoga classes, free entrance to Prague Zoo, and other perks.

## Behind the scenes at Apify

Take a virtual tour of our office with the company's CEO Jan urn, get a glimpse of a typical Apify teambuilding, and learn about the benefits of working with us.

[Follow us on TikTok ](https://www.tiktok.com/@apifyoffice)
